1.content:
A dark cloak flutters on an unseen wind in an unlit room. The figure wearing the cloak, a young slender woman with deathly pale skin, hovers above the floor with her legs crossed, chanting an ancient incantation.

A tall scantily clad redhead rummages through a large refrigerator, humming softly to herself as she schemed the next meal for the tower. She wiggles from side to side, her lissome form moving tantalizingly as she does.

This is Titans Tower, the headquarters to some of the youngest, and most tenacious, heroes of Earth; the Teen Titans. We follow...
1.title: The Tower

choices: An incantation that increases breast size.

"Azerath, metrion, zinthos..." The chant repeated countless times, the words imbued with power untold, fueled by Raven's will and focus. 11.title: Raven

111.content: As her meditation progressed, she turned her attention to today's objective. She briefly bemoaned an insecurity of hers, not that she would every admit to such a thing. A nagging jealousy sat in Raven's mind, and now before her was a thick, ancient tome that promised to rectify her perceived shortcoming. She was attractive - and she knew this - but she saw the attention that Starfire always seemed to get. Raven would never wear the kinds of clothes that Starfire wore, but she knew of another way to turn heads now. She began her chant in earnest, and the book before her began to glow an Eldritch green. She would find that...
111.title: An incantation that increases breast size.

choices: Thank goodness, she finds what she's looking for!
Well it seems to stop... for now at least...
A knock on the door... Really?! Now?!
There doesn't seem to be anything that will help with this... Wait it out?
Fuck! That wasn't the counterspell! It made it worse!
1114.content:
"Azerath, metrion, Zintho-ah!" Raven couldn't help but gasp as the power she had gathered suddenly surged and suffused her body. She felt shivers, but the heat in her body increased as if she was in the summer sun. She broke into a sweat, her breathing began to quicken, and she started to take stock of what was going on, what her body was doing. Was something wrong with the spell, she wondered? But that smile was short lived, as in the time she took to make this revelation, her chest had gained three new cup sizes, approaching F cups. She silently thanked her ability to move herself with but a thought, but still worried how big her newfound bosom would become. She searched for the spell, quickly finding her previous place in the book, and frantically tried to discern some form of counterspell for her rapidly growing predicament. She heard stitching begin to pop as her breasts reached HH cups in size, now as large as her head and beginning to take up a great deal of her torso, attention, and body mass.
1114.title: It's a Quick One!

11145.content:
Raven frantically made some quick alterations to the spell, hoping that her experience and confidence would win out against what was rapidly becoming her biggest mistake. She could feel the sides of her new tracts of land being exposed to the cool air of her room as her leotard started losing its battle with them. Sitting cross-legged as she had been, her breasts would nearly reach her lap, roughly the size of basketballs, her nipples painfully erect in the cold air. 13.content: Many are the individuals whose exceptional powers could change the world, for good or for ill. Where the Titans exact justice, they earn contempt, and their enemies are many indeed. One has managed to hatch a dastardly scheme...
13.title: A silent watcher (antagonist perspective)

choices: Slade releases a transformative, airborne agent into the tower...
Slade targets one Titan, hoping to bring them down from the inside.
Slade infiltrates the tower, posing as a Titan.
Slade releases a powerful transformative into the city's water supply!
Slade uses another as a pawn for his debased scheme...
131.content:
In a dark chamber lit only by dozens of monitors, the lone, imposing form of Slade Wilson leans forward in a high-backed chair, steepling his fingers as he peers over his surveillance.
"Of course, the Titans will rise to face me again and again. But what would happen if they could be... convinced to give into certain base instincts? What would they do if they didn't even notice the next crisis on their hands?"
131.title: Slade

info.brief_description: Very NSFW. Enter at your own risk.
info.description:
Do's:
- Growth of any sort, to any character. Just try to keep it within the continuity.
- Add details and think for yourself. No 'how big does she get?' Rather, if a previous option says 'she's not done growing,' just pick a size and describe her getting there. It ain't hard, I promise.
- New ideas and expanding the story is welcome.

Don't's:
- No scat, gore, death, or hard vore. I will also discourage bursting, but if written well I won't get rid of it.
- Nothing underage. The Titans might be called 'teens,' but in every source material I know of, each member of the team is at least eighteen years of age.
info.pretty_title: The Titans Have an Off Day
